Articles.Content: How do you determine what part of a model stays behind? Decoupler wise i notice sometimes parts stay and others eject. how do i do that?
Parts that stay on have a mesh name: anchor, special name sorta like node_collider.
ah thanks you kindly. i imported other meshes but they didn;t have the same name. i guess my imported changes the names

Wierd, I did one yesterday and it worked... just looked up the names: anchor stays on the ship, base goes with the detached part(s). Those are the node names, their respective meshes were named anchor-pivot-mesh and base-pivot-mesh dunno if those matter though.
I think stack decouplers completely separate. Only strut connectors + radial decouplers leave behind parts.
